alert.note: Alert for Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wise County and the City of Norton through 400 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wise, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norton, Wise, Big Stone Gap, Coeburn, Appalachia, Pound, St. Paul and Pardee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
